244.question: Which of the two speech recognition models works better overall on CN-Celeb?
244.response:
{'Image': 2, 'Rationale': 'This image directly compares the performance of the two speech recognition models (i-vector and x-vector) on the CN-Celeb dataset, which is necessary to answer the question.'}

The answer is: The x-vector model works better overall on CN-Celeb, as indicated by the lower Equal Error Rate (EER) of 15.52% compared to the i-vector's EER of 19.05%.
